tool_description: Give life to your QR Code with colors and custom graphics. Forget the dull black and white QR Code and start using the Customisable QR Code Generator to create a better connection with your customers
name: Customisable QR Code Generator with insane graphics
title: Customisable QR Code Generator with insane graphics
tool_name: Customisable QR Code Generator with insane graphics

api_list.name: POST-/public/generate-simple-qr-code
api_list.description: Generates a simple, non trackable qr code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://customisable-qr-code-generator-with-insane-graphics.p.rapidapi.com/public/generate-simple-qr-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "customisable-qr-code-generator-with-insane-graphics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
